verbose_text: As shown in XREF_FIG and Table S4 (Supporting information), Lysozyme (LYZ) gene expression was upregulated in F1 larvae with / without continued 0.1 and 10 mug/L BPA, and 10 mug/L BPS exposure and after infection with viral or bacterial mimics, LYZ expression was up-regulated in F1 larvae with / without continued 0.1 and 1 mug/L BPA, 10 mug/L BPF, and 10 mug/L BPS exposure.
evidence: LYZ expression was up-regulated in F1 larvae with/without continued 0.1 and 1 mug/L BPA, 10 mug/L BPF, and 10 mug/L BPS
